knimeNode.name: DirectProduct
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node takes input tables and creates a direct product of the rows.

fullDescription.intro:
For example, given:
A: Col1 |Col2 a |1 b |2 and B: Col3 x y z the result of AxB is: Col1 |Col2 |Col3 a |1 |x a |1 |y a |1 |z b |2 |x b |2 |y b |2 |z
